properties.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Sept 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This pipeline will pull all the data from the required fields of Contact table on a truncate and reload strategy from CRM and load it into CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONTACT_STG table in MsDynamics STAGE_CDI.

activities.name: cd-CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONTACT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Sept 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This copy activity will copy all the selected field's data from CONATCT table from CRM to CRM_PLAT_DYN_DIVORCECLAIM_STG table of STAGE_CDI CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONATCT_STG table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	  CONTACTID,
	  CUSTOMERTYPECODE,
	  NEW_CONTACTCATEGORYCODE,
	  PARENTCUSTOMERID,
	  PARENTCUSTOMERIDNAME,
	  OWNERID,
	  OWNERIDNAME,
	  FULLNAME,
	  ASC_BLUEBUTTONREF,
	  ASC_SONATACLIENTID,
	  ASC_SONATASTATUS,
	  ASC_SONATAOUTLETID,
	  ASC_SONATAOUTLETTYPE,
	  ASC_SONATAOUTLETSTATUS,
	  ASC_CALLERID,
	  JOBTITLE,
	  NEW_JOBCATEGORY,
	  EMAILADDRESS1,
	  ASC_CANOTIFICATIONALTERNATEEMAIL,
	  ASC_CANOTIFICATIONCCEMAIL,
	  TELEPHONE1,
	  MOBILEPHONE,
	  FAX,
	  ADDRESS1_COMPOSITE,
	  ASC_INTERNALCONTACT,
	  NEW_INACTIVEATCOMPANY,
	  NEW_ACCOUNTEXECVALIDATED,
	  NEW_REFERENCEACCEXECVALIDATIONID,
	  ASC_VIP,
	  ASC_VIPSETDATE,
	  ASC_VIPSETBYID,
	  ASC_REASONFORVIPSTATUS,
	  NEW_FINANCIALSDATE,
	  NEW_FINANCIALFREEASSETS,
	  NEW_FINANCIALCLIENTCOUNT,
	  NEW_FINANCIALTOTALASSETS,
	  NEW_FINANCIALCASH,
	  ASC_SONATAFINANCIALSDATE,
	  ASC_SONATAFREEASSETS,
	  ASC_SONATAPENDINGPURCHASES,
	  ASC_SONATACLIENTCOUNT,
	  ASC_SONATATOTALASSETS,
	  ASC_SONATACASH,
	  NEW_ACCEXEC_FSA_NO,
	  NEW_ACCEXEC_ACCT_EXEC,
	  ASC_MATRIXFIRMNAME,
	  ASC_MATRIXCONTACTID,
	  NEW_PROSPECTPHONEWORK,
	  ASC_DDIPHONE,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSNAME,
	  NEW_PROSPECTPHONEMOBILE,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSLINE1,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSLINE2,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSLINE3,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSLINE4,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSLINE5,
	  ASC_TWITTERUSERID,
	  ASC_TWITTERURL,
	  EMAILADDRESS2,
	  EMAILADDRESS3,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSPOSTCODE,
	  ASC_PARTNERMARKETING,
	  NEW_PROSPECTADDRESSCOUNTRY,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_FROM_W,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_EXT_W,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_TO_W,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WEEKEND_W,
	  TELEPHONE2,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_FROM_H,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_TO_H,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_EXT_H,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WEEKEND_H,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_FROM_M,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WKDAYS_TO_M,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_EXT_M,
	  NEW_INDIVIDUAL_TEL_WEEKEND_M,
	  NEW_TEAM_TEL_W,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_FROM_W,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_TO_W,
	  NEW_TEAM_EXT_W,
	  NEW_TEAM_WEEKEND_W,
	  NEW_TEAM_TEL_F,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_FROM_F,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_TO_F,
	  NEW_TEAM_EXT_F,
	  NEW_TEAM_WEEKEND_F,
	  NEW_TEAM_TEL_H,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_FROM_H,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_TO_H,
	  NEW_TEAM_EXT_H,
	  NEW_TEAM_WEEKEND_H,
	  NEW_TEAM_TEL_M,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_FROM_M,
	  NEW_TEAM_WKDAYS_TO_M,
	  NEW_TEAM_EXT_M,
	  NEW_TEAM_WEEKEND_M,
	  GENDERCODE,
	  FAMILYSTATUSCODE,
	  SPOUSESNAME,
	  BIRTHDATE,
	  ANNIVERSARY,
	  ORIGINATINGLEADID,
	  LASTUSEDINCAMPAIGN,
	  DONOTSENDMM,
	  TRANSACTIONCURRENCYID,
	  CREDITLIMIT,
	  CREDITONHOLD,
	  PAYMENTTERMSCODE,
	  DESCRIPTION,
	  PREFERREDCONTACTMETHODCODE,
	  DONOTEMAIL,

	  DONOTPHONE,
	  DONOTFAX,
	  DONOTPOSTALMAIL,

	  CREATEDBY,
	  CREATEDBYNAME,
	  CREATEDON,
	  MODIFIEDBY,
	  MODIFIEDBYNAME,
	  MODIFIEDON,
	  ASC_LASTUPDATEDBYSONATAON,
	  NEW_MIGRATIONTAG,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSNAME,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_1,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_2,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_3,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_4,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_5,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_POSTCODE,
	  NEW_ALT_ADDRESSLINE_COUNTRY,
	  ASC_PROFESSIONALBODY,
	  ASC_PROFESSIONALBODYOTHER,
	  ASC_SALESMANAGER,
	  ASC_BDTEAM,
	  ASC_CSTEAMID,
	  ASC_CSCONTACTID,
	  ASC_INDIVIDUALFSANUMBER,
	  ADDRESS1_LINE1,
	  ADDRESS1_LINE2,
	  ADDRESS1_LINE3,
	  ADDRESS1_CITY,
	  ADDRESS1_POSTALCODE,
	  ADDRESS1_COUNTRY,
	  MASTERCONTACTIDNAME,
	  ADDRESS1_NAME,
	  ACCOUNTIDNAME,
	  PARENTCONTACTIDNAME,
	  FIRSTNAME,
	  LASTNAME,
	  MIDDLENAME,
	  ADDRESS1_STATEORPROVINCE,
	  TELEPHONE3,
	  NEW_PROSPECTPHONEHOME,
	  NEW_PROSPECTEMAIL1,
	  SALUTATION
FROM CONTACT

activities.name: sp-truncate-CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONTACT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Sept 2023
Project - CRM Mirgation, implemented under CHG#####
Description - As a part of truncate and reload strategy ,this stored procedure will truncate the table CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONTACT_STG before loading any data into it .

activities.name: sp-UPDATE_BATCH_AUDIT-CRM_PLAT_DYN_CONTACT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Sept 2023
Project - CRM Migration. implemented under CHG#####
Description - This stored procedure is updating the BATCH_AUDIT table in STAGE_CDI with the required information of pipeline run .
